"I will <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3474>you,<s%> and make the rough <S%H1921>places<s%> <S%H3474>smooth.<s%> I will break the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of <S%H5154>brass<s%> in <S%H7665>pieces,<s%> and cut <S%H1438>apart<s%> the <S%H1280>bars<s%> of <S%H1270>iron.<s%>

I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> and hidden <S%H4301>riches<s%> of secret <S%H4565>places,<s%> that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> that it is <S%H3068>I,<s%> Yahweh, who <S%H7121>call<s%> you by your <S%H8034>name,<s%> even the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

For <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%>'s <S%H3478>sake,<s%> and Israel my <S%H972>chosen,<s%> I have <S%H7121>called<s%> you by your <S%H8034>name.<s%> I have <S%H3655>surnamed<s%> <S%H3045>you,<s%> though you have not known me.
I am <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and there is none <S%H2108>else.<s%> Besides <S%H430>me,<s%> there is no God. I will <S%H247>strengthen<s%> <S%H3045>you,<s%> though you have not known me;

that they may <S%H3045>know<s%> from the <S%H4217>rising<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> and from the <S%H4628>west,<s%> that there is <S%H657>none<s%> <S%H1107>besides<s%> <S%H3068>me.<s%> I am Yahweh, and there is no one else.

I <S%H3335>form<s%> the <S%H216>light,<s%> and <S%H1254>create<s%> <S%H2822>darkness.<s%> I <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H7965>peace,<s%> and <S%H1254>create<s%> <S%H7451>calamity.<s%> I am <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> who does all these <S%H6213>things.<s%>

<S%H7491>Distil,<s%> you <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> from <S%H4605>above,<s%> and let the <S%H7834>skies<s%> pour <S%H5140>down<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness.<s%> Let the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6605>open,<s%> that it may bring <S%H6509>forth<s%> <S%H3468>salvation,<s%> and let it cause <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> to spring <S%H6779>up<s%> <S%H3162>with<s%> <S%H3068>it.<s%> I, Yahweh, have created <S%H1254>it.<s%>

<S%H1945>Woe<s%> to him who <S%H7378>strives<s%> with his <S%H3335>Maker<s%>â€” a clay <S%H2789>pot<s%> among the clay <S%H2789>pots<s%> of the <S%H127>earth!<s%> Shall the <S%H2563>clay<s%> <S%H559>ask<s%> him who <S%H3335>fashions<s%> <S%H6213>it,<s%> 'What are you making?' or your <S%H6467>work,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> 'He has no hands?'
<S%H1945>Woe<s%> to him who <S%H559>says<s%> to a <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H3205><s%> 'What have you become the father <S%H802>of?<s%>' or to a mother, <S%H2342><s%> 'To what have you given birth?'"

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and his <S%H3335>Maker:<s%> "You <S%H7592>ask<s%> me about the things that are to <S%H857>come,<s%> concerning my <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and you <S%H6680>command<s%> me concerning the <S%H6467>work<s%> of my <S%H3027>hands!<s%>

I have <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> on <S%H3027>it.<s%> I, even my hands, have stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens;<s%> and I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> all their <S%H6635>army.<s%>

I have raised him <S%H5782>up<s%> in <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> and I will make <S%H3474>straight<s%> all his <S%H1870>ways.<s%> He shall <S%H1129>build<s%> my <S%H5892>city,<s%> and he shall let my <S%H1546>exiles<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%> <S%H4242>free,<s%> not for price nor <S%H7810>reward,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> "The <S%H3018>labor<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and the <S%H5505>merchandise<s%> of <S%H3568>Ethiopia,<s%> and the <S%H5436>Sabeans,<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4060>stature,<s%> shall come <S%H5674>over<s%> to <S%H3212>you,<s%> and they shall be yours. They will go <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5674>you.<s%> They shall come over in <S%H2131>chains;<s%> and they will bow <S%H7812>down<s%> to <S%H6419>you.<s%> They will make supplication to <S%H430>you:<s%> 'Surely God is in <S%H657>you;<s%> and there is none else. There is no other <S%H430>god.<s%>
Most <S%H403>certainly<s%> you are a <S%H410>God<s%> who <S%H5641>hidden<s%> <S%H430>yourself,<s%> God of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> the <S%H3467>Savior.<s%>'"

They will be <S%H954>disappointed,<s%> <S%H3637>yes,<s%> confounded, all of <S%H2796>them.<s%> Those who are makers of <S%H6736>idols<s%> will <S%H1980>go<s%> into <S%H3639>confusion<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>

<S%H3478>Israel<s%> will be <S%H3467>saved<s%> by <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> with an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H8668>salvation.<s%> You will not be <S%H3637>disappointed<s%> nor <S%H954>confounded<s%> to <S%H5769>ages<s%> <S%H5703>everlasting.<s%>

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> who <S%H1254>created<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> who <S%H3335>formed<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3559>it,<s%> who established it and <S%H1254>didn't<s%> create it a <S%H8414>waste,<s%> who <S%H3335>formed<s%> it to be <S%H3427>inhabited:<s%> "I am <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and there is no other.

I have not <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in <S%H5643>secret,<s%> in a <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness.<s%> I <S%H559>didn't<s%> say to the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H1245><s%> 'Seek me in <S%H8414>vain.<s%>' <S%H3068>I,<s%> Yahweh, <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness.<s%> I <S%H5046>declare<s%> things that are <S%H4339>right.<s%>

<S%H6908>"Assemble<s%> yourselves and <S%H935>come.<s%> Draw <S%H5066>near<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> you who have <S%H6412>escaped<s%> from the <S%H1471>nations.<s%> Those have no <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> who <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H6086>wood<s%> of their engraved <S%H6459>image,<s%> and <S%H6419>pray<s%> to a <S%H410>god<s%> that <S%H3467>can't<s%> save.

<S%H5046>Declare<s%> and <S%H5066>present<s%> <S%H3289>it.<s%> Yes, let them take counsel <S%H3162>together.<s%> Who has <S%H8085>shown<s%> this from ancient <S%H6924>time?<s%> Who has <S%H5046>declared<s%> it of <S%H3068>old?<s%> Haven't I, Yahweh? There is no other <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1107>besides<s%> <S%H6662>me,<s%> a just <S%H410>God<s%> and a <S%H3467>Savior;<s%> There is no <S%H369>one<s%> besides <S%H2108>me.<s%>
<S%H6437>"Look<s%> to <S%H3467>me,<s%> and be saved, all the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> for I am <S%H410>God,<s%> and there is no other.

They will <S%H559>say<s%> of <S%H6666>me,<s%> 'There is righteousness and <S%H5797>strength<s%> only in <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>'" Even to him shall men <S%H935>come;<s%> and all those who were <S%H2734>incensed<s%> against him shall be <S%H954>disappointed.<s%>
In <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall all the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be <S%H6663>justified,<s%> and shall <S%H1984>glory.<s%>
